text: taruvaya navu viryavannu raktada pindavagisidevu mattu a raktada pindavannu mansapindavagisidevu mattu a mansapindadinda elubugalannu srstisidevu mattu elubugalige mansada udugeyannu todisidevu. Anantara navu atanannu ondu hosa rupadalli huttisidevu. Allahanu samrd'dhanu mattu avanu atyuttama srstikartanu
